definitions.definition: a male child or, more generally, a male of any age:

examples: He used to like spending Friday nights with the boys.

definitions.definition: an approving way of speaking about your country's soldiers:
examples: We must not forget our boys serving far from home.
He plays baseball, drinks a lot of beer and generally acts like one of the boys.

definitions.definition: used to express excitement, worry, disappointment, etc. or to emphasize something:
